description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. My girlfriend lives 3000 miles away  :(   I want to see her... please help me.   Please try my game.  Enjoy this AMAZING game starring my girlfriend and help us out too!
